app_detail:
Audioburst Auto delivers fresh, short, real-time talk-audio content on any topic that interests you. Through expertly curated playlists of short-form audio content, Audioburst Auto makes it easy to listen to the best moments from your favorite podcasts and radio shows while youâ€™re on-the-go.

Audioburst listens to, extracts, contextualizes, and indexes millions of minutes of talk-audio content each day, breaking them down into bite-sized â€œbursts.â€ Bursts cut through the noise, making sure that when you tune in to Audioburst, you get the audio content that you crave â€“and nothing else. 

Your time is valuable, get the news and entertainment you want, whenever you need it, wherever you are, all for free!

Curated playlists ğŸ§

Our team of fun-loving audiophiles has cooked up a selection of curated playlists covering everything from politics, to basketball, to the latest celebrity gossip.

Audioburst playlists are smart and entertaining, with the occasional bit of â€œweirdâ€ tossed in for good measure ğŸ¤ª Our selection of expert opinions, in-depth analysis of current events, fun facts, and quirky trivia will take the pain out of getting stuck in traffic.

Build a playlist of your own ğŸ›  

If customization is your thing, weâ€™ve got you covered! Enjoy a personalized playlist ğŸ“»

Build your own custom listening experience from the ground up by selecting from our diverse selection of categories and topics, or add your own keywords to the mix to make it more your own
Your personalized playlist will be updated and ready for you every time you sign-in
Change your mind about a keyword or topic? No worries! You can update your playlist anytime for a new, fresh take on the dayâ€™s trending stories

Right here, right now ğŸ‘‡

Audioburst Auto is all about getting you the information you need while you are on the move, which is why we cut our audio â€œburstsâ€ in real-time.

Get up-to-the-minute local weather, news, and traffic reports, sourced from the local radio stations you know and trust alongside the rest of your favorite content.

Whether thereâ€™s a bad storm on the way, or a traffic jam up ahead, Audioburst Auto ensures that youâ€™re informed and prepared.

Eyes on the road ğŸš˜ ğŸ‘€

When youâ€™re flying down the road at 60+ MPH, it is no time to be dealing with a touch screen! Use voice commands to search for any topic in our extensive talk-audio library.

Youâ€™ll drive safely, and weâ€™ll dish up quality results gathered from thousands of live and on-demand talk-audio sources.
